New Records: Canada posted the highest score in New York this T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Nicholas Kirton and Shreyas Movva added 75 runs for the fifth wicket off 63 balls
Jeremy Gordon and Dilon Heyliger held their own at the death to deliver Canada a famous win
Mark Adair and George Dockrell resurrected the Irish innings and put on 62 for the seventh wicket
Pre-Game Insights: Niall O'Brien: Ireland should have restricted Canada to 115-120
Niall O'Brien: There is a bit of Lara about Kirton
Post-Match Reflections: Gordon helps Canada take powerplay honours
Ireland put Canada in early trouble
Kirton and Movva make the move
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Associate has struck twice in two days
Canada's win is the third time they have beaten Ireland in T20Is
They are the only Full Member team they have beaten in the format
